short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a new verse of the day artwork every day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get beautiful Bible art delivered to you daily with the Bible Verse of the Day Chrome extension. Simply open your browser window or open a new tab to see custom Bible art each day.

Find a verse you like? Share with a friend! Click to share to Faithlife, Twitter, or Facebook.

Download the Bible Verse of the Day Chrome extension today!
